data.content:
verb
-rates; -rated; -rating
[+ obj] US :to calculate (something) according to the specific amount that someone has done, used, etc.
We will prorate your monthly rent for the remaining 10 days on your lease. [=you will pay 10 days' worth of a month's rent]
The player's annual salary was prorated because he only played for the last three months of the season.
